https://tmrev.io/movie/423354-A Frightful School Horror 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null This film tells three scary stories that take place in and around a school in Japan. While each of the stories can be viewed independently, they are linked by location and by the time they occur. The events are defined on the last day of summer vacation, the students contemplate the passage of their temporary freedom and the resumption of classes A Frightful School Horror
